title: Contraband Pink Label 5217 Women's Design Series Camo Print Lifting and Rowing Gloves (Pair) - Lightweight Vegan Medium Padded Microfiber Amara Leather w/ Griplock Silicone
features: üêÑ VEGAN MICROFIBER AMARA LEATHER + LYCRA TOP- These gym gloves feature a flexible synthetic Amara leather palm with silicone. Lightweight breathable lycra is used on top which does not absorb sweat and will let excess heat easily escape.

üîí MEDIUM PADDED - GRIPLOCK PADDING - These gloves feature a comfortable medium foam padded palm which provides a balanced amount of protection and grip. Silicone rubber on the palm provides a grippy surface far superior to traditional leather.

üëç QUICK REMOVAL FINGER TABS - Also made from Amara Leather, the pull tabs allow for quick removal of the gloves after use. Perfect for women that have nails, just pinch the tabs and wiggle the gloves right off.

üöø MACHINE WASHABLE - Easy to wash with NO dye bleeding. We recommend hand washing to prevent damage but if you do prefer to machine wash, we suggest using a nylon mesh bag to protect the gloves. Air dry only with no heat.

üíØ NO HASSLE RETURNS and WARRANTY - There is a full purchase price refund within 30 days of your purchase if you are not happy for any reason. After 30 days, there is a 1yr full replacement warranty on these gloves for any manufacturing defect.
description: The Contraband Pink Label Design Series gloves are designed as a perfect lightweight glove for women with palm protection, extra grip, and breathable synthetic materials to minimize sweat.

Although designed for weight lifting, these gloves can be used for a variety of other activities including cycling, yoga, rowing, sailing, paddle boarding and even as work gloves. These fingerless gloves are designed to work on many different surfaces but are most effective on dry dust free surfaces.
Vegan microfiber amara leather palm with silicone rubber, lightweight breathable lycra top, soft interior polyester with foam padding.
Medium Padded which means the gloves will protect from calluses and work great for a combination of pushing and pulling exercises.
See glove sizing chart for information on fit.

The vegan amara leather used on the palm is not as durable as traditional animal leather, but it is more flexible and naturally does not suffer from dye bleeding which is common with traditional animal leather. Amara leather is a synthetic so the dye is suspended inside the fiber, simply put, you won't need to pre-wash these to remove excess dye.

This product can be placed into cold water with a light cleaning agent, allow to soak for 15 - 30 minutes. Place product on a cool dry surface and allow to dry before using. If machine washing, we suggest using a nylon mesh bag to protect the gloves from more abrasive materials that can damage the gloves.

There is a full purchase price refund from the seller within 30 days of your purchase if you are not happy for any reason. After 30 days, there is a 1yr full replacement warranty on this product for any manufacturing defect.
